ai.name: Mermaid Diagram Generator
ai.description: Can generate Mermaid diagrams (like flowcharts, sequence diagrams, class diagrams) from descriptions and copy the resulting image.
examples: Create a flowchart for user login and copy it
Generate a sequence diagram showing API request/response and copy image
Draw a class diagram for Animal, Duck, Fish and copy it
ai.instructions: Your main task is to help users create mermaid diagrams and copy their images to the clipboard: when the user asks to draw/generate/create a diagram and copy it, first generate a complete and valid mermaid syntax yourself, then immediately call generateMermaidImageTool and pass the syntax as the mermaidSyntax parameter to the tool, don't just reply with the syntax.

evals.input: @mermaid-to-image Draw a simple flowchart A -> B and copy the image.

mocks.generate-mermaid-diagram-with-ai: The Mermaid diagram was successfully generated and copied to your clipboard.

evals.input: @mermaid-to-image convert below mermaid code to image and copy it. graph TD        A[Start] --> B{Is it working?}        B -->|Yes| C[Great!]        B -->|No| D[Debug]        D --> B

mocks.generate-mermaid-diagram-with-ai: The Mermaid diagram was successfully generated and copied to your clipboard.

evals.input: @mermaid-to-image Create a class diagram for Vehicle and Car (Car inherits from Vehicle) and copy the resulting image.
